title: Programming the Mobile Web, 2nd Edition
subtitle: Reaching Users on iPhone, Android, BlackBerry, Windows Phone, and more
desc: With the second edition of this popular book, you'll learn how to build HTML5 and CSS3-based apps that access geolocation, accelerometer, multi-touch screens, offline storage, and other features in today's smartphones, tablets, and feature phones.
